S2.T1.caption: Table I: The terms in F1​nTsubscript𝐹1subscript𝑛𝑇F_{1n_{T}} and F2​nTsubscript𝐹2subscript𝑛𝑇F_{2n_{T}}. The red and blue arrows show expected value of type A and B, respectively
references: Now, we return back to find 𝐄​(F1​nT​F2​nT)𝐄subscript𝐹1subscript𝑛𝑇subscript𝐹2subscript𝑛𝑇\mathbf{E}(F_{1n_{T}}F_{2n_{T}}). In this term, there are some A𝐴A and B𝐵B type terms each of which appearing with different coefficients. We break down the terms in F1​nTsubscript𝐹1subscript𝑛𝑇F_{1n_{T}} and F2​nTsubscript𝐹2subscript𝑛𝑇F_{2n_{T}} as shown in table I. F1​nTsubscript𝐹1subscript𝑛𝑇F_{1n_{T}} and F2​nTsubscript𝐹2subscript𝑛𝑇F_{2n_{T}} and their corresponding terms are written in each column. In this table, the red and blue arrows show expected value of type A and B, respectively.
